title: Gravity Falls
resume: Twin brother and sister Dipper and Mabel Pines are in for an unexpected adventure when they spend the summer helping their great uncle Stan run a tourist trap in the mysterious town of Gravity Falls, Oregon.
character: Grunkle Stan / Soos / Old Man McGucket
